variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Additional Flags
variables.description: This allows switching to additional flags like Aikar's Flags, recommended for usage on all bukkit-based Softwares (for example Paper, Purpur, ...)

variables.name: Maximum Ram Percentage
variables.description: Decide how much of your servers ram to allocate for Hytale usage.

variables.name: Java Agent
variables.description: ADVANCED FEATURE: Set a custom java agent to use, useful for SWM or similar.

variables.name: Override Startup
variables.description: ADVANCED FEATURE: Override the displayed startup command to support all other variables, contact support to change.

variables.name: SIMD Operations Support
variables.description: Add Support for SIMD Operations by adding --add-modules=jdk.incubator.vector, used in forks like Pufferfish or Purpur for improved map rendering performance. (Java 16-21)

variables.name: JVM Flags
variables.description: All startup flags can be modified except for Xms
